https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kSJO3w9ErWaaW0XESROwF6O4qwD.jpg The film tells the story of Shrihari who, in search of his brother Madavan, makes it to Bangkok. In the middle of this search, Shrihari has to face lots of problems and struggles. Bangkok Summer
